div1.p:
Hon. J. D. Porter
Assistant Secretary of State
Washington D.C.

I have just heard that the U.S. Minister to Liberia was coming back. Is it so? If so could I go back as U.S. Vice Consul Genl? Your Government is still indebted to me as U.S. Vice Consul Gen'l, may I not hold the position as did before until I am reward for service rendered? I am anxious to go back in the service
Livingstone College.
Dodge Hall.
Rev. J. C. Price, A. M., President
Prof. E. Moore, A. M., Secretary.
Rev. C. R. Harris, Treasurer.
of your Government. I can stand the climate.
Please inform the Secretary of State of my request. Do all you can for me.

I am, Sir,
Your Obedient Servant
Samuel S. Sevier
(address) = Franklinton
N.C.
